mapper.insert: insert into tbl_payment(m_code, money, p_means, mileage) values(#{m_code}, #{money}, #{p_means}, #{mileage})
mapper.update: update tbl_member set money=money+#{money}, mileage=mileage+#{mileage} where m_code = #{m_code};
update tbl_member set mileage = mileage-#{mileage} where m_code = #{m_code}
update tbl_member set m_grade = #{m_grade} where m_code = #{m_code}
